room_title: Escape room "The Asylum" by Can You Escape in London
room_description:
In the late 80’s, a few dozen of people mysteriously disappeared throughout USSR and have never been found since then. When the archives from that time were declassified, they revealed that a special psychiatric clinic was carrying out illegal human trials.
In the secret laboratory HEC_0153, scientists were examining the possibilities of the human brain in complete isolation from the world. As an experienced specialist, you were sent to learn and investigate all the remaining secrets of this institution.
Locked inside one of the highly guarded rooms of the facility, called “The Asylum”, you have an hour to escape or else... Who knew that the dreaded doctors are not willing to share their secrets even after their deaths!
